column4: How do I get a web browser in ubuntu that is Internet Explorer with Active X controls
that is a good idea, is there a way to install IE though?
- yes... you can get ie6 installer from MSs site and then install it via wine.
I notied the apt-get sources.list for the link you sent me has edgy and I am running fiesty
thank you, I can now do my mathxl homework in ubuntu with out having to install windows
- depends... in some cases it might go to /home/username/trash or /.trash
- not really... charge users a fee to play each month.  Or spam them with advertisements within the game and as they login...
ahh, seems like an unstable business method
- you can change the tilesets/theme within your server settings and spam advertisements for companies... that might cover hosting costs.  I don't know about "making money"
maybe opening up a server farm will do the trick
- probably not but good luck to you.
yeah i'm just a poor college student haha
- most people dont like to pay to play.  Paying $50 a year for XBox live is a stretch for most.
I hear you on that, paying to play blowz
